module.title: nouns
module.p: Nouns are words which typically refer to material entities in the physical world – people, animals, objects, substances, places, &c.
Nouns are classified into two distinct semantic-grammatical types, depending on the way they refer to entities and the kinds of word they can appear with –

ul.li: proper nouns – names of particular entities eg. Seumas James, Glaschu Glasgow, Laideann Latin
common nouns – classes of entity eg. duine person, baile town, cànan language
